page.curvetext:
Leading Climate Modes Associated with Atlantic Seasonal Hurricane Extremes
Leading Climate Modes Associated with
Atlantic Seasonal Hurricane Extremes

Variations in tropical convection represent dominant forcing of coherent circulation anomalies associated with seasonal and multi-decadal extremes in Atlantic hurricane activity.
Variations in tropical convection
represent dominant forcing of coherent
circulation anomalies associated with
seasonal and multi-decadal extremes in
Atlantic hurricane activity.

anomalies from 1949-2004.
